about: My name is Mbalentle Diko, I am from Khayelitsha. I went to the Centre Of Science And Technology, where I got introduced to Information technology as a subject, and I knew I wanted more of what I was given there and then I knew that I belonged there and I will be going there. From a young age, I have been captivated by the power of the internet and its ability to connect people and revolutionize industries. As I delved deeper into the realm of web development, I discovered the endless possibilities it offers for creativity, problem-solving, and making a lasting impact on individuals and businesses alike. After matric, I applied to Life Choices Academy where I am still at, doing web development. Information Technology as a whole fascinates me. I am grateful to be in the Technology industry, and I am prepared to learn more.

experiences.name: Life Choices Academy
experiences.duty: Learn different programming languages, build websites

skills.title: Good public skills
skills.explanation: I have good public speaking skills: I had a 6 weeks training by Speak to Inspire where I was taught authenticity and passion. The power of storytelling and how to craft and deliver compelling stories.

skills.title: Critical thinking
skills.explanation: I am able to think on my feet and make informed decisions by analyzing information, identifying biases, and evaluating evidence.

skills.title: Team work
skills.explanation: Ability to work in a team: I enjoy having more opinions to consider before making a decision, and I respect the views and opinions of other people.

skills.title: Excellent adaptation skills
skills.explanation: I easily adapt to different working conditions.

skills.title: Time Management
skills.explanation: I am able to plan and schedule my time properly, making sure to include all of my responsibilities and being on time on every task assigned.

testimonials.name: Zizipho
testimonials.quotes: Mbalentle embodies a remarkable blend of diligence and ambition. With a commendable work ethic, she consistently strives to achieve her goals, fueled by a genuine passion for success.

testimonials.name: Yakupha
testimonials.quotes: Mbalentle is a determined classmate who is always looking for ways to improve. She is easy to work with and gives everyone a chance to voice their opinions.

testimonials.name: Lonke
testimonials.quotes: I wholeheartedly recommend my classmate as a web developer. Their technical expertise, problem-solving abilities, teamwork, and dedication to learning make them a highly capable and valuable professional. I have no doubt that they will continue to excel in their career and contribute immensely to the field of web development.

testimonials.name: Mapule
testimonials.quotes: Mbalentle has a professional drive. Her pleasant personality and confidence make her presence valuable in every setting.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: Keyboard
projects.description: I had made this keyboard using CSS and HTML to show my understanding of using CSS.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: This is a Basic BMI calculator I did that calculates a person's Body mass index
